website_summaries.verdict: Superman alongside his deadliest foe – and considering how large, sturdy, and action-packed Doomsday is, kids will genuinely enjoy the big brute.
pros: Includes Superman and giant Doomsday figures
Simple gear on Doomsday’s backpack activates punching and throwing motions
cons: Turning Doomsday’s gear via the Superman toy looks odd

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Bad Guy Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old asked for "bad guy toys" for Christmas so I chose several super villain figurines from the imaginext collection and they were a big hit! Doomsday is big and scary and superman's cape is actually fabric so it flys behind him. I actually planned to give this toy only 4 stars when it arrived because I was less than impressed with its "punching" action and awkward placement of the standing pad on his back, but my sons' (ages 2 and 4) immense enjoyment bumped it back up to a 5. Bottom line: It's sturdy and fun. If they're happy, I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWarriorMom

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to see my daughters face on Christmas morning it looks so cool I made my husband and my brother in law come look. I expected it to be smaller its actually kinda big lex didn't come with it but that's ok since she already has 3 ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Any Collection of DC Heroes
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves Superheroes, and in particular Batman and his fellow DC heroes. This set makes for a nice addition to his collection, with a villain that few of us 'older' fans might not be familiar with, but kids recognize instantly. Perfect for his age group (4-7). This toy will not go unplayed with.
customer_reviews.author: Narukami

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves all imaginext toys. We have never had a problem with any of them. They are very durable. My son has had most of his since he was 2. He is now 4 so they definitely grow with him too! They have all kinds of different themes but the super hero ones are definitely his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends, Feature Villain
product_meta.description:
Has the Man of Steel finally met his match? The result of Kryptonian genetic engineering gone wrong, Doomsday is a monster who's a real threat to Superman and Metropolis! Kids can create epic battles between these two DC Super Friends figures - with exciting Imaginext features to bring their stories to life. Just turn the Power Pad right to activate Doomsday punching action - and turn it left to have Doomsday swing the construction beam. Both Superman and Doomsday have super strength and super speed, so who will win out? That's up to kids and their own powers of imagination to decide! Imaginext. Turn on Adventure!.

BRAND STORY
By Fisher Price
feature_bullets: Turn Power Pad right for punching action!
Turn Power Pad left--Doomsday swings the construction beam!
Includes Doomsday figure with construction beam and Superman figure with scratched chest
Just turn the Power Pad right to activate Doomsday punching action
A great gift for Imaginext fans

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars139 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
